thread.title: Allu Arjun's next moving at a brisk pace
thread.title_full: Allu Arjun's next moving at a brisk pace - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Allu Arjun's next moving at a brisk pace
text: It has already been reported that Boyapati Sreenu's film with Allu Arjun is moving on a brisk pace. Now, according to the latest update, a special family song is being shot on the entire unit in RFC. Rakul Preet and Srikanth are also taking part in this song which is being shot in a lavishly laid set in RFC. Expectations are soaring high on this film as it would be interesting to see how Boyapati presents Bunny in an aggressive role. S S Thaman scores music and Geetha Arts will be producing this flick.
